quotes.quote: I'll make you so in love with me, that every time our lips touch you'll die a little.
A woman's happiness is in throwing everything away to live for love.
He turns the black-and-white landscape into brilliant colors. That's what George was to me. Even if our paths don't ever cross again, that will never change.
I'm not going to lose. No matter how hard it is, I'm not going to run away. Watch me use this hand and capture the future!
Loving a person isnâ€™t about logic or reason.

I'm alright. All I did was lose a love. Even without George, this city is still overflowing with people. My days are busy. Nothing will change. But... why do the lights look like they're in black-and-white? Just because one person isn't here.
Stop rushing me. I want to take my time falling in love with you.
Miwako, George is Bi. He is gender blind.
He turns the black-and-white landscape into brilliant colors. That's what George was to me. Even if our paths don't ever cross again, that will never change.
